Start with the outcome that you want to achieve‚Äîfor yourself and your viewer‚Äîand work backward to find the right tools that make reaching the outcome faster and easier. FAQ for AI video editing software What's the best AI video editor? That depends on your video editing needs. Kapwing, Adobe Premiere, Synthesia, and Muse all offer AI-based video editing tools that help producers automatically remove silence, add effects, generate avatars, and search video files.
